abstract: Will Google’s new portal help small businesses? Is it time to stop paying attention to click-through rates? And why you should give your sales force a checkup.
snippet: Will Google’s new portal help small businesses? Is it time to stop paying attention to click-through rates? And why you should give your sales force a checkup.
lead_paragraph: What’s affecting me, my clients and other small-business owners today.

headline.main: Today in Small Business: Google My Business
